segments.text: My gaze shifts to the other side of the kitchen, near the cupboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is balanced precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks quite wobbly, with splayed legs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open upper cabinet, specifically a 'COOKIE JAR.'
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With one hand, he's grabbing cookies, and with the other, he holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like he's trying to catch the cookies or use the plate as a lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His younger sister stands nearby, her arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely shocked by their boldness, right under the woman's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt when that stool inevitably tips.
segments.speaker: PAR
